attributes.title: Worse than Flappy Bird
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app lower than 1 star. The graphics on the app are so poor I could barely read the text provided. There are very few political issues covered. I would rather see flappy bird on the AppStore than this unhelpful and useless app.
